review: Looks NOTHING like the photo. It came in super wrinkly, the plastic felt horribly cheap. Not heavy duty what so ever, and even the rings in the bindings do not match the picture. Its horrible. I demanded a refund immedietly. Feels like it can fall apart in a week..
productTitle: Avery Heavy-Duty Binder with 2-Inch One Touch EZD Ring, Blue (79882)
